column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I'm visiting Chicago from Los Angeles for a conference
column2: and decided to check out the AIC while here. I must say I was seriously impressed. Even with the Getty and LACMA in LA
column3: the Art Institute had some really heavy hitters when it came to their impressionist and surrealist collections (which are my favorite forms of art). The Monets
column6: and Cezannes were gorgeous to see in person
column7: and I was impressed to see the self portrait of Van Gough in such a place. But throw in your Degas
column9: and Pollack and in you're in an impressionist-surrealist-modern heaven.
